projectPurpose: To provide developers with a fast, user-friendly, and easily integrable search engine solution for websites and applications, enabling relevant and instant search experiences with features like typo tolerance and AI-powered hybrid search.

alternatives.name: Elasticsearch
mainFeatures: Integrated with Elastic Stack (Kibana, Logstash, Beats)

alternatives.name: Typesense
alternatives.license: Open Source - Apache License 2.0 (core historically GPL-3.0)

marketPositioning: Meilisearch is positioned as a developer-friendly, open-source search engine offering a balance of speed, ease of use, and modern features like AI-powered hybrid search. It competes with established open-source platforms like Elasticsearch and Solr by prioritizing simplicity and a great out-of-the-box developer and user experience, while also presenting itself as a cost-effective and open-source alternative to proprietary SaaS solutions like Algolia. Its focus is on providing instant, relevant search results for applications and websites with minimal setup and configuration.
